My Grid

Basic Grid

myGrid is built mobile first, with additional layout break points at sm(30em), md(48em) and lg(60em).

myGrid provides a generic, simple 16-column, class and percentage based grid system.

Flex Box Grid

myGrid also provides a FlexBox based Grid system. Flex Columns will automatically resize to fill the containing row space.

Flex Column Widths

You can give individual columns widths, with the remainder of the space filled by the other 'f-columns'.

.col.f-col
.col.col--8
.col.f-col

Spacing Columns

You can also give columns fixed widths and space them out using flexbox 'justify-content' properties
